Title: Playing with Matrix: Conduit and Synapse
Description: I’ve been playing around with Matrix homeservers. I like the idea of running my own federated server to join random channels in.

Title: The Web is Dead, Long Live the Web - YottaAnswers Blog
Description: The original version of the Web based on high-quality organic hypertext links is long gone. It has been largely replaced with captive silos of information targeted at keeping users within walled gardens to the maximum extent with links to external content being marginalized in order to keep the user engagement the highest. Social networks are […]

Title: Shrinkwrap: Taming dynamic shared objects
Description: This is a blog post of a paper I have submitted for a UCSC course project. If you are interested in the code check out https://github.com/fzakaria/shrinkwrap One of the fundamental data management units within a Linux system are the shared object files that are loaded into memory by dynamically linked processes at startup. The mechanism and approach to which dynamic linking is done has not changed since it’s inception however software has become increasingly complex.

Title: Be Generous With Your Interfaces
Description: Be generous with your interfaces. Take as little as you need, give as much as you can.

Title: Why I don’t believe in long-term thinking
Description: Do we really know what the future needs?
